name: VIOLIN
description: Most violins have a hollow wooden body. It is the smallest and thus highest-pitched instrument (soprano) in the family in regular.

name: GUITAR
description: The guitar is a fretted musical instrument that typically has six strings. It is held flat against the player's body and played.

name: VOICE
description: On several marketing blogs, though, “tone of voice” is confused with written tone when used to describe writing for a brand.

name: SAXOPHONE
description: As with all single-reed instruments, sound is produced when a reed on a mouthpiece sound wave inside the instrument's body.

name: PIANO
description: A piano makes a sound when each key moves a small hammer that strikes a metal string. The inside looks kind of like a harp.

name: TRUMPET
description: The technical distinction between trumpet and horn is that one-third  a trumpet is conical while the horn's tube is the opposite.

name: DISCO
description: Disco is a genre of dance music and a subculture that emerged in the 1970s from the United States' urban nightlife scene.

name: TABLA
description: A tabla is a pair of twin hand drums from the Indian subcontinent. percussion instrument in Hindustani classical music.

name: HARMONIUM
description: Harmonium, also called Reed Organ, free-reed keyboard instrument that produces sound when wind sent by foot-operated bellow
